content: life is gourd celebrate fall with a playful pumpkin beanie live the gourd life in this personable pumpkin beanie textured ridges are worked top down in the round and completed with warm folded ribbing and decorated with foliage in 2 sizes 1-3yo child and adult you re able to match with the loves of your life <3 details skill level intermediate/advanced beginner i will not be teaching you how to crochet but how to crochet this particular pattern many photos and detailed instructions are given but prior knowledge of basic skills is needed this pumpkin beanie is worked top down starting with the stem the ribbing is flat and worked back and forth while slip stitching to attach to the hat sizes 1-3yo child adult dimensions brim folded 17in 22in circumference 7 5in 9in length crochet gauge dimensions 13dcs = 4 inches stitches needed us terminology chain - chain st - stitch slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet blsc - single_crochet in back loop fpdc - front post double_crochet materials i used hobby lobby i love this yarn for the original sample but i have also made samples with other acrylic aran weights that made for lovely pumpkin hats as long as you meet gauge and are happy with the fabric please feel free to make substitutions as you wish about 110yds 180yds orange about 30yds 35yds brown about 15yds 15yds green *all yardage is given a cushion and has been increased by about 10% to ensure everyone has enough yarn regardless of gauge e g i only used about 100yds of orange but the yardage i list is 110yds * 5mm/h hook scissors tapestry needle this is one of my first patterns i have tested extensively but if you have any questions or concerns please feel free to reach out to me and i ll do my best to help you out <3
